content.question: As described in the final paragraph, the changes that have occurred in the area around the shack suggest that

choices.label: Lila is returning to the shack after a long absence
Lila is not sure that she remembers where the shack is
someone is now maintaining the landscape around the shack
a fire has damaged the landscape around the shack

content.answer: Lila is returning to the shack after a long absence

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
